story.title: Our Story
story.p1: {brandName} was founded with a simple premise: B2B marketing doesn't have to be complicated, but it does have to be strategic.
story.p2: After years of working in-house at fast-growing startups and enterprise companies, our founders saw the same problems repeated: agencies that didn't understand B2B, strategies built on vanity metrics, and a disconnect between marketing activities and business outcomes.
story.p3: We built {brandName} to be different. Every strategy we develop, every campaign we run, and every piece of content we create is designed with one goal: driving measurable business growth.
